description:

team.

PUT /api/0/teams/the-interstellar-jurisdiction/the-obese-philosophers/ HTTP/1.1
Host: sentry.io
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "name": "The Inflated Philosophers"
}
